remarks: The algebra of matrices with dimension 1 over a commutative ring is a commutative ring.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mat1dim.a $e |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) $.
mat1dim.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mat1dim.o $e |- O = <. E , E >. $.
mat1dimcrng $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ E e. V ) -> A e. CRing ) $.
